questions:
Q1: What are the synonyms of "Remote (Adj)"?
A. Online, virtual
B. Simplify
C. plain

Q2: What are the antonyms of "Minimalist (Adj)"?
A. Manual
B. traditional
C. Complex, excessive
Q3: Unscramble the letters to find the correct spelling: "sjldea- uCAod()bd"

Q4: What are the synonyms of "Remote (Adj)"?
A. Online
B. Online, virtual
C. New venture

Q5: What are the synonyms of "Hybrid (Adj)"?
A. intelligent
B. Mixed, combined
C. optimize

Q6: What is the meaning of "Remote (Adj)"?
A. To make a process more efficient
B. Combination of two different things
C. Working or operating from a distance

Q7: What are the antonyms of "Cloud-based (Adj)"?
A. physical
B. Corporation
C. Offline, local

Q8: What are the antonyms of "Minimalist (Adj)"?
A. single
B. Complex, excessive
C. Pure

Q9: What are the antonyms of "Cloud-based (Adj)"?
A. Offline, local
B. Complicate
C. single
Q10: Fill in the blank: "We need to streamline our workflow."

Q11: What are the antonyms of "Remote (Adj)"?
A. perfection
B. Downgrade
C. On-site, physical

Q12: What are the antonyms of "Glitch (Noun)"?
A. clutter
B. Corporation
C. Fix, perfection
Q13: Unscramble the letters to find the correct spelling: "l(jdbCse adud-)Ao"

Q14: What is the meaning of "Glitch (Noun)"?
A. A sudden small error or bug
B. Stored or managed online instead of locally
C. Driven or supported by artificial intelligence

Q15: What are the synonyms of "Hybrid (Adj)"?
A. error
B. Mixed, combined
C. Basic
Q16: Fill in the blank: "He drives a hybrid car."
Q17: Fill in the blank: "There was a glitch in the system."
Q18: Fill in the blank: "Her room has a minimalist design."

Q19: What are the synonyms of "Upgrade (Verb)"?
A. virtual
B. intelligent
C. Update, enhance
Q20: Fill in the blank: "Her room has a minimalist design."

Q21: What is the meaning of "Streamline (Verb)"?
A. A newly established business
B. Simple and clean in style
C. To make a process more efficient
answers: A6: Working or operating from a distance
A14: A sudden small error or bug
A21: To make a process more efficient
